Output from Part 2:

*   Forklift main body
*   Pair of lifting forks
*   Vertical mast assembly
*   Operator's seat
*   Steering control (e.g., wheel, tiller)
*   Operational controls (e.g., levers, dashboard)
*   Wheels
*   Counterweight section
*   Prominent battery compartment (indicating electric power)
*   Absence of a visible exhaust pipe (characteristic of electric power)
